    • Method Detail

      • checkIn

        public void checkIn()
        checks in a book by the isbn code. checks to make sure its has the correct input. if current record says that all books are checked in it will give you a message saying so and allow you to correct your choice.

      • showByType

        public void showByType()
        allows users to find a book by the type category. Has input checking to check for correct input choice. prints out a list of books of the selected category

      • searchTitle

        public void searchTitle()
        Allows users to check by title to find a book. a call number is returned to them after to allow them to find the book

      • checkoutBook

        public void checkoutBook()
        allows users to check out a book by isbn number. checks to make sure it's a valid input and then for book availability. if a periodical isbn is ran the program returns a message telling them they cannot sign them out. when a book is checked out the availability is updated before finishing the function.

      • randomList

        public void randomList()
        Produces a random list of books for the user based of their input of how many books they want to be shown. Checks users input for correct data type

      • displayMenu

        public int displayMenu()
        Displays the main menu and returns the users choice in as an Int checks for user input to make sure it returns an Int
        Returns:
        int choice

      • readFile

        public void readFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the text file in the res folder and puts the data into book objects in their correct category. Checks for the category off the last digit of the isbn number
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the current Array list of books into the same file that the program read out of before.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
